How can I make a trustable sync between all four machines for the future?

title: Jocular message "GAH your tab just crashed" is annoying. Please replace it with something more appropriate
content: The jocular message "GAH your tab just crashed" is annoying because the program (Firefox) ought to apologise and empathise; instead it makes a joke about a situation which is very annoying and frustrating. It feels like when a friend lets you down and instead of apologising they make you feel worse by saying something callous and patronising like "Tough! Well just live with it." Please replace it with something more appropriate.

title: FIREFOX, CERTIFICADO ACA Y AUTOFIRMA.
content:
Hola, mi sistema operativo es macOS Big Sur 11.6.1.

Soy usuaria de una tarjeta inteligente de ACA (Autoridad de Certificación de la Abogacía), por lo que tengo entendido la tarjeta y el certificado que lleva instalado dentro solo funcionan con Firefox ya que la extensión del certificado solo es compatible con este navegador.

Mi certificado no es exportable, solo se puede utilizar introduciendo la tarjeta inteligente en un lector de tarjetas que ACA proporciona.

Tengo instalados en el navegador tanto los certificados raíz de ACA como el dispositivo de seguridad (lector de tarjeta) e introducida correctamente la ruta de la biblioteca para que éste funciona. De hecho, si accedo a ajutes/privacidad y seguridad/certificados: mi certificado personal aparece en mis certificados; los certificados raíz de ACA y el certificado de Autofirma aparecen como autoridades. Los permisos de confianza están habilitados.

Si verifico mi equipo a traves de la dgt para comprobar si Autofirma esta correctamente instalado, éste verificador ejecuta autofirma, encuentra mi certificado y me permite terminar el trámite. Por lo tanto debería de funcionar. Adjunto imagen donde se recoge la verificación.

Sin embargo, cuando accedo a la página web donde quiero realizar un trámite ante la administración, accedo con mi certificado, relleno la instancia que corresponda y cuando quiero enviarlo, me solicita que permita ejecutar autofirma. Le concedo el permiso, ejecuta autofirma y NO encuentra ningún certificado en el almacen. El error que aparece el SAF_19.

He comprobado que firefox no tenga otro perfil, solo tiene uno y en él están instalados los certificados. He instalado los certificados antes que Autofirma. He concedido todos los permisos de confianza también en el llavero de mac. He contactado con todos los servicios de soporte tanto de ACA, Colegio profesional, DGA, Apple y todo parece funcionar correctamente.
creator: NCHV

title: Segnalazione errore
content:
Salve, quando cerco di iniziare un gioco su facebook (mallworld per l'esattezza) mi appare questo messaggio "An error occurred running the Unity content on this page. See your browser JavaScript console for more info. The error was: QuotaExceededError: The quota has been exceeded." e anche se lo chiudo il gioco non parte. Non so cosa significhi, nè cosa devo fare. C'è qualcuno che può aiutarmi?

Hi, when I try to start a game on facebook (mallworld to be exact) I get this message: "An error occurred running the Unity content on this page. See your browser JavaScript console for more info. The error was: QuotaExceededError: The quota has been exceeded." and even if I close it the game doesn't start. I don't know what it means, or what I have to do. Is there someone who can help me?

title: Continuous errors with firefox loading webpages
content:
Hi, this is driving me up the wall and I'm about to change over to chrome if it can't be fixed. For over a week now, firefox has been erroring on a heap of websites (I got 3 page and loading errors just trying to log into this site, so it's not an unsecure webpage problem.) If you refresh the page 1-3 times it'll usually go through. Once it's gone through, it'll usually allow you to use that site for at least a while before starting to error again.

I've disabled all addons except my adblocker, norton safe search and privacy badger add ons (all of which I've had for ages with no problems). Computer has been scanned as virus free. No problems with other browsers. Any ideas please?

Typical example message when trying to open a page.

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to diaryofanottb.com. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
